Album: The Best Damn Thing: Deluxe Edition
Lyric:
[00:07.779]Waking up I see that everything is ok
[00:11.198]The first time in my life and now it's so great
[00:14.780]Slowing down I look around and I am so amazed

[00:22.890]I wouldn't change a thing about it
[00:28.779]This is the best feeling
[00:35.960]This innocence is brilliant
[00:40.134]I hope that it will stay
[00:42.869]This moment is perfect
[00:47.066]please don't go away
[00:49.869]I need you now
[00:55.367]And I'll hold on to it
[00:59.484]don't you let it pass you by
